df-ocv
blocks.content: Define the orthocomplement function in a given set (which usually is a pre-Hilbert space): it associates with a subset its orthogonal subset (which in the case of a closed linear subspace is its orthocomplement). (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-ocv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cocv, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), crab(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cv(s1), wceq(co(cv(s2), cfv(cip, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, cv(s0)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-ocv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ ocv =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà P((Base ` s0))‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà(Base ` s0)| ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1,(s2[(¬∑ ` s0)]s3)=(0 `(Scalar ` s0)))}))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-css
blocks.content: Define the set of closed (linear) subspaces of a given pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-2011.)

blocks.name: df-thl
blocks.content: Define the Hilbert lattice of closed subspaces of a given pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: ocvfval
blocks.content: The orthocomplement operation. (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)

  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), c5)))))), diffsc(s2, c3))

  syl5eq(c2, cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), c5)))), cfv(cocv, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cocv, c0), cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), c5))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cocv, cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), c5)))), cmpt(s0, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), crab(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cip, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))))))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), crab(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cip, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, cv(hs0)))))), cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), c5))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  pweqd(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rabeqbidv(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cip, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))))), wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), c5)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  ralbidv(s2, cv(s0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cip, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, cv(hs0)))), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), c5))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s1), cfv(cip, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, cv(hs0))), co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), c5, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  syl6eqr(cfv(csca, cv(hs0)), c6, cfv(csca, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  fmpti(s0, cmpt(s0, cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), c5)))), cpw(c3), cpw(c3), crab(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), c5))))

  ssrab2(s1, c3, wral(s2, cv(s0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), c5)))

  diff.cbs.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)

  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)

thm ocvfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)}))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(¬∑ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(0 ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(ocv ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c5)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)})), d(s0, c4))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)})), d(s0, c5))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)})), d(s1, c4))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)})), d(s1, c5))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)})), d(s2, c3))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)})), d(s2, c4))
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 =(s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)})), d(s2, c5))
  syl5eq(c2, (s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)}), (ocv ` c0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (ocv ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)}), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cocv, (s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)}), (s0 ‚àà P((Base ` hs0))‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà(Base ` hs0)| ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[(¬∑ ` hs0)]s2)=(0 `(Scalar ` hs0)))}))
  mpteq12dv(s0, P((Base ` hs0)), { s1 ‚àà(Base ` hs0)| ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[(¬∑ ` hs0)]s2)=(0 `(Scalar ` hs0)))}, P(c3), { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)}, hs0 = c0)
  pweqd((Base ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0)
  rabeqbidv(s1, (Base ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[(¬∑ ` hs0)]s2)=(0 `(Scalar ` hs0))), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5))
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c3, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  ralbidv(s2, s0, hs0 = c0, (s1[(¬∑ ` hs0)]s2)=(0 `(Scalar ` hs0)), (s1[c4]s2)= c5)
  eqeq12d((s1[(¬∑ ` hs0)]s2), (0 `(Scalar ` hs0)), (s1[c4]s2), c5, hs0 = c0)
  oveqd(s1, (¬∑ ` hs0), s2, c4, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((¬∑ ` hs0), c4, (¬∑ ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cip)
  syl6eqr((0 `(Scalar ` hs0)), c5, (0 ` c6), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2d(c0g, (Scalar ` hs0), c6, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Scalar ` hs0), c6, (Scalar ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, csca)
  df-ocv(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  mp3an((s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)})‚àà ùïå, ((s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)}): P(c3)‚Üí P(c3)), P(c3)‚àà ùïå, P(c3)‚àà ùïå)
  fmpti(s0, (s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)}), P(c3), P(c3), { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)})
  eqid((s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)}))
  a1i(s0 ‚àà P(c3), { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)} ‚àà P(c3))
  elpwi2({ s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)}, c3, universe)
  ssrab2(s1, c3, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5))
  pwex(c3)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  fex2((s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)}), P(c3), P(c3), universe, universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà P(c3)‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c3 | ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,(s1[c4]s2)= c5)}))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cbs, hs0)
  diff.cbs.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c3)

blocks.name: ocvval
blocks.content: Value of the orthocomplement of a subset (normally a subspace) of a pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)

thm ocvval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c4)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cip, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csca, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c6))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cocv, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  sylbir(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c4)))), wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
  elpw2(c0, c1)
  pm2.61ian(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c4)))), wcel(c5, universe))
  sylan9eq(cfv(c2, c0), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c4))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(hs0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c4)))), c0), wcel(c5, universe), wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
  fveq1d(c2, c0, cmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(hs0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c4)))), wcel(c5, universe))
  ocvfval(hs0, s0, s1, c5, universe, c2, c1, c3, c4, c6)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cpw(c1), cmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(hs0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c4)))), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c4))), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(hs0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c4))))
  rabbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c4)), wral(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c4)))
  raleq(s1, cv(hs0), c0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c4))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cpw(c1), crab(s0, c1, wral(s1, cv(hs0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c4)))))

blocks.name: ocvi

blocks.origin:
thm ocvi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c0, c4, c3), c5))

  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cip, c7))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(csca, c7))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c8))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cocv, c7))
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(c0, c4, c3), c5), wral(hs0, c2, wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(hs0)), c5)))
  simp3bi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wral(hs0, c2, wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(hs0)), c5)), wss(c2, c6), wcel(c0, c6))
  elocv(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c6, c4, c5, c7, c8)
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c3, wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(hs0)), c5), wceq(co(c0, c4, c3), c5))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, c4, cv(hs0)), c5, co(c0, c4, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c3, c0, c4)

  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)

}

blocks.name: ocvss
blocks.content: The orthocomplement of a subset is a subset of the base. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ocvss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2)
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cocv, c3))

thm ocvin(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  mpbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, c1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cip, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, c1))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cip, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0))))
  ancoms(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(c3, c1)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cip, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0))))
  ocvi(cv(hs0), c3, c1, cv(hs0), cfv(cip, c0), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cbs, c0), c0, cfv(csca, c0))

  lssel(c1, c2, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  ipeq0(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cip, c0), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), c4, cfv(csca, c0))

  elin(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(c3, c1))

  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cin(c1, cfv(c3, c1)), c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))

} = {

  ancoms(hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà(c3 ` c1), (hs0[(¬∑ ` c0)]hs0)=(0 `(Scalar ` c0)))
  ocvi(hs0, c3, c1, hs0, (¬∑ ` c0), (0 `(Scalar ` c0)), (Base ` c0), c0, (Scalar ` c0))
  syl2anc(((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3 ` c1))), ((hs0[(¬∑ ` c0)]hs0)=(0 `(Scalar ` c0))‚Üî hs0 = c4), c0 ‚àà PreHil, hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0))
  simpll(c0 ‚àà PreHil, c1 ‚àà c2, (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c3 ` c1)))

thm ocvsscon(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wb(wss(c1, cfv(c4, c3)), wss(c3, cfv(c4, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cocv, c0))
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(c1, cfv(c4, c3)), wss(c3, cfv(c4, c1)))
  syl2im(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(c1, cfv(c4, c3)), wss(c3, cfv(c4, c1)), wss(c3, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c3))), wss(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c3)), cfv(c4, c1)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2), wss(c3, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c3))))
  ocvocv(c0, c3, c2, c4)
  ocv2ss(c1, cfv(c4, c3), c4, c0)
  sstr2(c3, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c3)), cfv(c4, c1))
  syl2im(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2)), wss(c3, cfv(c4, c1)), wss(c1, cfv(c4, c3)), wss(c1, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1))), wss(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(c4, c3)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c2), wss(c1, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1))))
  ocvocv(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  ocv2ss(c3, cfv(c4, c1), c4, c0)
  sstr2(c1, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(c4, c3))
}

thm ocvlsp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(c3, c1)))

} = {
  eqssd(cfv(c3, cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(c3, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(c3, c1)), wss(c1, cfv(c4, c1)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2), wss(c1, cfv(c4, c1)), wcel(c0, clmod))
  lspssid(c0, c1, c2, c4)

  syldan(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2), wss(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(c3, cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)))), wss(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
  ocvocv(c0, cfv(c3, c1), c2, c3)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1))), cfv(c3, cfv(c4, c1))), wss(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1))), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(clss, c0)), wss(c1, cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c0, clmod))
  phllmod(c0)
  syldan(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(clss, c0)), wss(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c1), c2))

  eqid(cfv(clss, c0))
  ocv2ss(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c3, c0)
}

  abbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cocv, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(cocv, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c3, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  eqeq2d(cv(s0), cfv(cfv(cocv, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(cocv, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))), cfv(c3, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq12d(cfv(cocv, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(cocv, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), c3, cfv(c3, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

thm iscss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ccss, c0))
} = {
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(c2, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c2))), wcel(c2, cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))))))
  eleq2d(c2, c3, cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  cssval(hs0, c0, c1, c3, c4)
  elab3(hs0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), wceq(c2, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c2))))
  syl6eqel(c2, universe, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c2)), wceq(c2, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c2))))
  id(wceq(c2, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c2))))
  fvex(c4, cfv(c4, c2))
  eqeq12d(cv(hs0), cfv(c4, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), c2, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  2fveq3(cv(hs0), c2, c4, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c2, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c2))))
}

thm iscss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà c3 ‚Üî c2 =(c4 `(c4 ` c2))))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(ocv ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(ClSubSp ` c0)
} = {
  syl6bb(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c2 =(c4 `(c4 ` c2)), c2 ‚àà { hs0 | hs0 =(c4 `(c4 ` hs0))})
  eleq2d(c2, c3, { hs0 | hs0 =(c4 `(c4 ` hs0))}, c0 ‚àà c1)
  cssval(hs0, c0, c1, c3, c4)
  elab3(hs0, c2, hs0 =(c4 `(c4 ` hs0)), c2 =(c4 `(c4 ` c2)))
  syl6eqel(c2, universe, (c4 `(c4 ` c2)), c2 =(c4 `(c4 ` c2)))
  id(c2 =(c4 `(c4 ` c2)))
  fvex(c4, (c4 ` c2))
  eqeq12d(hs0, (c4 `(c4 ` hs0)), c2, (c4 `(c4 ` c2)), hs0 = c2)
  id(hs0 = c2)
  2fveq3(hs0, c2, c4, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c2 =(c4 `(c4 ` c2)))
}

blocks.name: cssi
blocks.content: Property of a closed subspace (of a pre-Hilbert space). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: cssss
blocks.content: A closed subspace is a subset of the base. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)

blocks.name: iscss2
blocks.content: It is sufficient to prove that the double orthocomplement is a subset of the target set to show that the set is a closed subspace. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscss2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, c3), wss(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ccss, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cocv, c0))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, c3), wss(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c1), wceq(c1, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2), wb(wcel(c1, c3), wceq(c1, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)))))
  iscss(c0, cphl, c1, c3, c4)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(c1, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1))), wss(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c1)), wss(c1, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1))))
  ocvocv(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  baib(wss(c1, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1))), wceq(c1, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1))), wss(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c1))
  eqss(c1, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iscss2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí(c1 ‚àà c3 ‚Üî(c4 `(c4 ` c1))‚äÜ c1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(ClSubSp ` c0)

} = {
  bitrd((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), c1 ‚àà c3, (c4 `(c4 ` c1))‚äÜ c1, c1 =(c4 `(c4 ` c1)))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà PreHil, c1 ‚äÜ c2, (c1 ‚àà c3 ‚Üî c1 =(c4 `(c4 ` c1))))
  iscss(c0, cphl, c1, c3, c4)
  syl((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), (c1 =(c4 `(c4 ` c1))‚Üî(c4 `(c4 ` c1))‚äÜ c1), c1 ‚äÜ(c4 `(c4 ` c1)))
  ocvocv(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  baib(c1 ‚äÜ(c4 `(c4 ` c1)), c1 =(c4 `(c4 ` c1)), (c4 `(c4 ` c1))‚äÜ c1)
  eqss(c1, (c4 `(c4 ` c1)))
}

blocks.name: ocvcss
blocks.content: The orthocomplement of any set is a closed subspace. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ocvcss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ccss, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cocv, c0))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4), wss(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1))), cfv(c3, c1)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1))), cfv(c3, c1)), wss(c1, cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1))))
  ocvocv(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  ocv2ss(c1, cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1)), c3, c0)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2), wb(wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4), wss(cfv(c3, cfv(c3, cfv(c3, c1))), cfv(c3, c1))), wss(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
  a1i(wss(c1, c2), wss(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
  ocvss(c3, c1, c2, c0)
  iscss2(c0, cfv(c3, c1), c2, c4, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ocvcss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üí(c3 ` c1)‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(ClSubSp ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(ocv ` c0)
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), (c3 ` c1)‚àà c4, (c3 `(c3 `(c3 ` c1)))‚äÜ(c3 ` c1))
  syl((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ c2), (c3 `(c3 `(c3 ` c1)))‚äÜ(c3 ` c1), c1 ‚äÜ(c3 `(c3 ` c1)))
  ocvocv(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  ocv2ss(c1, (c3 `(c3 ` c1)), c3, c0)
  sylan2(c0 ‚àà PreHil, c1 ‚äÜ c2, ((c3 ` c1)‚àà c4 ‚Üî(c3 `(c3 `(c3 ` c1)))‚äÜ(c3 ` c1)), (c3 ` c1)‚äÜ c2)
  a1i(c1 ‚äÜ c2, (c3 ` c1)‚äÜ c2)
  ocvss(c3, c1, c2, c0)
  iscss2(c0, (c3 ` c1), c2, c4, c3)
}

blocks.name: cssincl
blocks.content: The zero subspace is a closed subspace. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cssincl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cin(c1, c3), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccss, c0))
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cin(c1, c3), c2))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c0, cphl), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cin(c1, c3), c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cun(cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c3))), c2))

  unssi(cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c3), cfv(cbs, c0))
  ocvss(cfv(cocv, c0), c1, cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  ocvss(cfv(cocv, c0), c3, cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  ocvcss(c0, cun(cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c3)), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cocv, c0), c2)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eleq1d(cin(c1, c3), c2, cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cun(cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c3))), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl6eqr(cin(c1, c3), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cun(cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c3))), cin(cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c1)), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c3))), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  ineqan12d(c1, c3, cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c1)), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c3)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  cssi(c1, c2, cfv(cocv, c0), c0)
  cssi(c3, c2, cfv(cocv, c0), c0)

  eqid(cfv(cocv, c0))
}

thm cssincl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1 ‚ãÇ c3)‚àà c2)

  syl6eqr((c1 ‚ãÇ c3), ((ocv ` c0)`(((ocv ` c0)` c1)‚ãÉ((ocv ` c0)` c3))), (((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` c1))‚ãÇ((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` c3))), (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))

blocks.name: css0

blocks.name: css1

blocks.name: csslss
blocks.content: A closed subspace of a pre-Hilbert space is a linear subspace. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm csslss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccss, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clss, c0))
} = {
  eqeltrd(c1, c3, cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c1, cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c1))))
  cssi(c1, c2, cfv(cocv, c0), c0)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c1)), c3), wss(cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c1), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  a1i(wcel(c1, c2), wss(cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c1), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  ocvss(cfv(cocv, c0), c1, cfv(cbs, c0), c0)
  ocvlss(c0, cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), c1), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cocv, c0), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cocv, c0))
}

blocks.name: cssmre
blocks.content: The closed subspaces of a pre-Hilbert space are a Moore system. Unlike many of our other examples of closure systems, this one is _not_ usually an algebraic closure system ~ df-acs : consider the Hilbert space of sequences ` NN --> RR ` with convergent sum; the subspace of all sequences with finite support is the classic example of a non-closed subspace, but for every finite set of sequences of finite support, there is a finite-dimensional (and hence closed) subspace containing all of the sequences, so if closed subspaces were an algebraic closure system this would violate ~ acsfiel . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cssmre(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, cfv(cmre, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ccss, c0))
} = {
  ismred(hs0, c1, c2, wcel(c0, cphl))
  css1(c0, c2, c1)
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wcel(cint(cv(hs0)), c1), wss(cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0)))), cint(cv(hs0))))
  ssrdv(hs1, cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0)))), cint(cv(hs0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)))

  sylibr(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0)))))), wcel(cv(hs1), cint(cv(hs0))), wal(hs2, wi(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  alrimiv(hs2, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0)))))), wi(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  expr(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))
  eleqtrrd(cv(hs1), cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cv(hs2))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))))
  sseldd(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cv(hs2))), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0)))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))))
  ad2antll(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wss(cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cv(hs2)))))
  3syl(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), wss(cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0)))), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cv(hs2)))), wss(cint(cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)), wss(cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0)))))
  intss1(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))
  ocv2ss(cint(cv(hs0)), cv(hs2), cfv(cocv, c0), c0)
  ocv2ss(cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0))), cfv(cocv, c0), c0)

  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))
  sseldd(cv(hs2), c1, cv(hs0), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))))
  simprr(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))
  cssi(cv(hs2), c1, cfv(cocv, c0), c0)
  elint(hs2, cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  vex(hs1)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wb(wcel(cint(cv(hs0)), c1), wss(cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cfv(cfv(cocv, c0), cint(cv(hs0)))), cint(cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, cphl), wss(cint(cv(hs0)), c2))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls))

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(Moore ` c2))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(ClSubSp ` c0)
} = {
  ismred(hs0, c1, c2, c0 ‚àà PreHil)
  css1(c0, c2, c1)
  mpbird((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ), ‚ãÇ hs0 ‚àà c1, ((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0))‚äÜ ‚ãÇ hs0)
  ssrdv(hs1, ((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0)), ‚ãÇ hs0, (c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ))
  ex((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ), hs1 ‚àà((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0)), hs1 ‚àà ‚ãÇ hs0)
  sylibr(((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚àß hs1 ‚àà((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0))), hs1 ‚àà ‚ãÇ hs0, ‚àÄ(hs2,(hs2 ‚àà hs0 ‚Üí hs1 ‚àà hs2)))
  alrimiv(hs2, ((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚àß hs1 ‚àà((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0))), (hs2 ‚àà hs0 ‚Üí hs1 ‚àà hs2))
  expr((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ), hs1 ‚àà((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0)), hs2 ‚àà hs0, hs1 ‚àà hs2)
  eleqtrrd(hs1, hs2, ((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` hs2)), ((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚àß(hs1 ‚àà((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0))‚àß hs2 ‚àà hs0)))
  sseldd(hs1, ((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` hs2)), ((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0)), ((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚àß(hs1 ‚àà((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0))‚àß hs2 ‚àà hs0)))
  ad2antll((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ), hs1 ‚àà((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0)), hs2 ‚àà hs0, ((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0))‚äÜ((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` hs2)))
  3syl(hs2 ‚àà hs0, ((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0))‚äÜ((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` hs2)), ‚ãÇ hs0 ‚äÜ hs2, ((ocv ` c0)` hs2)‚äÜ((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0))
  intss1(hs2, hs0)
  ocv2ss(‚ãÇ hs0, hs2, (ocv ` c0), c0)
  ocv2ss(((ocv ` c0)` hs2), ((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0), (ocv ` c0), c0)
  simprl((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ), hs1 ‚àà((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0)), hs2 ‚àà hs0)
  syl(((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚àß(hs1 ‚àà((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0))‚àß hs2 ‚àà hs0)), hs2 =((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` hs2)), hs2 ‚àà c1)
  sseldd(hs2, c1, hs0, ((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)‚àß(hs1 ‚àà((ocv ` c0)`((ocv ` c0)` ‚ãÇ hs0))‚àß hs2 ‚àà hs0)))

  intssuni(hs0)
  sylib((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ), ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚äÜ c2, hs0 ‚äÜ P(c2))
  sstrd(hs0, P(c2), c1, (c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß hs0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ))
  simp2(c0 ‚àà PreHil, hs0 ‚äÜ c1, hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ‚àà PreHil, hs0 ‚äÜ c1, hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c1 ‚äÜ P(c2))
  ssrdv(hs0, c1, P(c2), c0 ‚àà PreHil)

  sylibr(hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà P(c2), hs0 ‚äÜ c2)
  cssss(hs0, c1, c2, c0)
  selpw(hs0, c2)
  sspwuni(hs0, c2)
  iscss2(c0, ‚ãÇ hs0, c2, c1, (ocv ` c0))
  eqid((ocv ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà PreHil)

blocks.name: mrccss
blocks.content: The Moore closure corresponding to the system of closed subspaces is the double orthocomplement operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mrccss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cocv, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ccss, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmrc, c5))
} = {
  eqssd(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1))), wcel(c5, cfv(cmre, c2)), wss(c1, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1))), wcel(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c5))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c5, cfv(cmre, c2)))
  ocvocv(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c5), wss(cfv(c4, c1), c2))
  a1i(wss(c1, c2), wss(cfv(c4, c1), c2))
  ocvss(c4, c1, c2, c0)
  ocvcss(c0, cfv(c4, c1), c2, c4, c5)
  mrcsscl(c5, c2, c1, cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), c3)
  sseqtr4d(cfv(c4, cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(c3, c1), cfv(c4, cfv(c4, cfv(c3, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wss(c1, c2)))

  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, cthl, co(c3, csts, cop(cfv(coc, cnx), c4)), co(cfv(cipo, cfv(ccss, cv(hs0))), csts, cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cfv(cocv, cv(hs0)))))
  oveq12d(cfv(cipo, cfv(ccss, cv(hs0))), csts, cop(cfv(coc, cnx), cfv(cocv, cv(hs0))), c3, cop(cfv(coc, cnx), c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cipo, cfv(ccss, cv(hs0))), c3, cfv(cipo, c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2d(cipo, cfv(ccss, cv(hs0)), c5, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(ccss, cv(hs0)), c5, cfv(ccss, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ccss)
  opeq2d(cfv(coc, cnx), cfv(cocv, cv(hs0)), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cocv, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(cocv, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  eqid(cfv(cple, cfv(cipo, c1)))
}

thm thlleval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(c0[c3]c2 ‚Üî c0 ‚äÜ c2))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(toHL ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(ClSubSp ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(le ` c4)
} = {
  mp3an1(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1, (c0[c3]c2 ‚Üî c0 ‚äÜ c2), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c1, ccss, c5)
  ipole(c1, universe, c0, c2, c3, (toInc ` c1))
  eqtr4i(c3, (le `(toInc ` c1)), (le ` c4))
  thlle((le `(toInc ` c1)), c4, c5, c1, (toInc ` c1))
  eqid((toInc ` c1))
  eqid((le `(toInc ` c1)))
}

blocks.name: thloc
blocks.content: Orthocomplement on the Hilbert lattice of closed subspaces. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm thloc(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(coc, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cthl, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cocv, c2))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(c0, cfv(coc, c1)), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl6reqr(c0, cfv(coc, c1), cfv(coc, co(cfv(cipo, cfv(ccss, c2)), csts, cop(cfv(coc, cnx), c0))), wcel(c2, universe))
  fveq2d(coc, c1, co(cfv(cipo, cfv(ccss, c2)), csts, cop(cfv(coc, cnx), c0)), wcel(c2, universe))
  thlval(c2, universe, c1, cfv(cipo, cfv(ccss, c2)), c0, cfv(ccss, c2))
  eqid(cfv(ccss, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cipo, cfv(ccss, c2)))
  mp2an(wceq(c0, cfv(coc, co(cfv(cipo, cfv(ccss, c2)), csts, cop(cfv(coc, cnx), c0)))), wcel(cfv(cipo, cfv(ccss, c2)), universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  fvex(cipo, cfv(ccss, c2))
  fvexi(c0, cocv, c2)
  setsid(cfv(cipo, cfv(ccss, c2)), universe, c0, universe, coc)
  3eqtr4a(c0, cfv(coc, c1), emptycls, cfv(coc, emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  str0(coc, cfv(coc, cnx))
  ocid()
  syl5eq(c0, emptycls, cfv(cocv, c2), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fvprc(c2, cocv)
  fveq2d(coc, c1, emptycls, wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(cthl, c2), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  fvprc(c2, cthl)
}

thm thloc(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(oc ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(toHL ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(ocv ` c2)
} = {
  pm2.61i(c0 =(oc ` c1), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl6reqr(c0, (oc ` c1), (oc `((toInc `(ClSubSp ` c2))[sSet]<(oc ` ndx), c0 >)), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fveq2d(coc, c1, ((toInc `(ClSubSp ` c2))[sSet]<(oc ` ndx), c0 >), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  thlval(c2, universe, c1, (toInc `(ClSubSp ` c2)), c0, (ClSubSp ` c2))
  eqid((ClSubSp ` c2))
  eqid((toInc `(ClSubSp ` c2)))
  mp2an(c0 =(oc `((toInc `(ClSubSp ` c2))[sSet]<(oc ` ndx), c0 >)), (toInc `(ClSubSp ` c2))‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(cipo, (ClSubSp ` c2))
  fvexi(c0, cocv, c2)
  setsid((toInc `(ClSubSp ` c2)), universe, c0, universe, coc)
  3eqtr4a(c0, (oc ` c1), emptycls, (oc ` ‚àÖ), ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  str0(coc, (oc ` ndx))
  ocid()
  syl5eq(c0, emptycls, (ocv ` c2), ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c2, cocv)
  fveq2d(coc, c1, emptycls, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, (toHL ` c2), ¬¨ c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c2, cthl)
}
